attributes.action: Give H.M the Queen more money to repair the crumbling palaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Buckingham palace and Windsor castle are falling into disrepair, work that needs doing include replacing slate roofs at Buckingham Palace and Windsor Castle, estimated at £16m, and updating heating and electrical services at the palace at a price of £2.4m, replacing cast iron and lead Victorian water mains at Windsor Castle was estimated to cost another £3m.
These buildings do not belong to H.M the Queen they are held by her in trust for the nation and it is disgusting that after they have stood for hundreds of years and withtood the Nazi bobmings they might be destroyed by our own governments negligence.
